title: 12,500 $JAMM Bounty for Website
body:
I propose that we allocate 12,500 $JAMM to Michael (Discord #6791) for working on https://jammpad.com/. Michael will build the features listed in this doc: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ujV--wWWIiEjBCbvRF9Nd4SMckZz3oVvpGafdw-17EM/edit. This includes API integrations for web3, Outpost and Etherscan. He will build it in a way that provides a good base to extend it further, for example adding delegated vaults.

Proposer: Shreyas, Discord #2656
Recipient: Michael, Discord #6791
Recipient Address: 0xfbA2C2bBF977eDA19Ad819Bb46787F4C91d1fFaD
Budget Category: Bounty
Payment Date: After completion of website design (on the 1st or 15th of the month)
author: 0x10D6d2e343281D388291A3e02f3293AaEdA67178
